A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This white hot dumpster fire has pretty much no redeeming qualities (outside of the special effects)\, basically zero plot\, doesn't connect any dots from previous movies in any rewarding/satisfying way. It's essentially a practical joke aimed at anyone that's enjoyed any of the past movies and the 40+ years of lore built around them. PS. I've never rated a single movie on here in the entirety of Rotten Tomatoes existence.... That's how bad this movie is.
